content: First draft of the DK FHIR Core Implementation Guide can now be seen at http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7dk/dk-core-r4/
definitions are currently unstable and in a draft

The DK Core IG will be subject for ballot at the next affiliate meeting. Have a look at https://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7dk/dk-core/
Feedback can be provided here ;)

The first danish HL7 FHIR IG (the HL7 FHIR DK Core IG) got approved today (with comments) - which is sort of a HUGE thing. Once the last few details have been corrected we'll make sure you don't miss the link ;) I've been working on this for quite a few years. I'm glad that we have now finally passed that milestone which hopefully will only be the start for a new way of working with standards within healthcare IT.
the dk-core is also now available using github actions on https://hl7dk.github.io/dk-core/index.html
Did you end up publishing any actions, or is it all a scripted workflow?
@Vadim Peretokin working with @Jose Costa Teixeira to fix that
